channel.title: Dice game [DELTA] rep++
channel.description: I'm trying to make the dice game on my delta. I've made the flower game, but I just don't know how to do something of this sort. I know that I need something along the lines of this: [code]Random generator = new Random(); int r = generator.nextInt(9);[/code] Would anybody point me in the right direction?

item.title: Dice game [DELTA] rep++
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

I’m trying to make the dice game on my delta.
I’ve made the flower game, but I just don’t know how to do something of this sort.
I know that I need something along the lines of this:

Random generator = new Random(); int r = generator.nextInt(9);
Would anybody point me in the right direction?
